text: Billy Campbell (born July 7, 1959) is an American movie and television actor. ==Roles== ===Television=== He first gained attention for his role as Luke Fuller in the TV series Dynasty. Then he became known for playing *Rick Sammler on Once and Again *Det. Joey Indelli on Crime Story *Jordan Collier on The 4400 *Dr. Jon Fielding on the Tales of the City miniseries *Darren Richmond on the AMC television series The Killing *Dr. Alan Farragut in the SYFY series Helix *Det. John Cardinal on CTV's Cardinal ===Movies=== His most notable movies include *The Rocketeer *Bram Stoker's Dracula *Enough ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Billy Campbell
